name: cover-fossil
effect: Give to a scientist in a museum to receive a tirtouga.
short_effect: Can be revived into a tirtouga.

flavor_text.black_white: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea in ancient times. It appears to be part of its back.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea in ancient times. It appears to be part of its back.
